snippet: More than 31,000 retired police officers and firefighters received a $12,000 pension payment on Thursday and were later told: “Do not spend this money.”
abstract: Retired New York City police officers and firefighters receive $12,000 pension payment due to mistake on part of Financial Information Services Agency, which is responsible for the city's payroll and pension systems; recipients are warned not to spend the money.
lead_paragraph: More than 31,000 retired police officers and firefighters received a $12,000 pension payment on Thursday and were later told: “Do not spend this money.”

headline.main: $298 Million Mistake Gives New York City Retirees Brief Windfall
headline.print_headline: $298 Million Mistake Gives City Retirees Brief Windfall
